name: Clear the Way
description:
Can only be used while a Axe is equipped; choose one mode to apply to target adjacent space:
 • Destroy all player created tiles.
 • Convert Foliage into a plain tile.
 • Move any occupying units into an empty adjacent space
 • Do nothing.
Afterwards move into target space.
@{const:variant:Cleaving Variant:} If a foe is moved, deal 10% nonlethal damage to that foe.
